```
"cert_signers": {
   "kxoid.bit": ["12F5SvxoPR128aiudte78h8pY7mobroG6V", "18Mt3CWBpiqJBLsPSu5JxB4B9MeaSwhyJ"],
   "zeroid.bit": ["1iD5ZQJMNXu43w1qLB8sfdHVKppVMduGz"]
  },
```

In your JS:
```
Page.cmd("certSelect", [["zeroid.bit", "kxoid.bit"]]);
```

refer to zerotalk for an example.
